Title: Standardizing the Metaverse with Yu Yuan
Description:
Marc Petit (Epic Games) is joined by guest Yu Yuan, the President of the IEEE Standards Association, to talk about the wide-ranging history and standards that the IEEE has and how the IEEE is helping to standardize the  metaverse.
